summary: A cop on vacation at a mountain resort comes to the rescue when the resort is taken over by violent criminals.

Turner|Dorothy Fehr|Vladimir Kulich|Alex Diakun|Sonny Surowiec|Scott McNeil|Rob Wilton|Douglas Arthurs|Rick Pearce|John 'Bear' Curtis|Chris Turner|Garvin Cross|Duncan Fraser|Melody Stark|Wade Flett|Tom Pickett|Suzy Joachim|Lloyd Berry|James Thom|Barry W. Levy|Brad Loree|Ashley Da Costa|Scott J. Ateah|Gerry Therrien|Mike Crestejo|Marc Akerstream|Owen Walstrom|Lisa Love
title: Rompedor Jack
